post.description: Creates one or more contributors in the project. Requires *Manage contributors* admin right. If `is_admin` flag is set to `true`, the user would automatically get access to all project languages, overriding supplied `languages` object. Attribute `fullname` will be ignored, if the user has already been registered in Lokalise. Requires write_contributors OAuth access scope.

fullname.description: Full name (only valid for inviting users, who previously did not have an account in Lokalise).

is_reviewer.description: Whether the user has Reviewer access to the project.

is_writable.description: Whether the user has write access to the language.

languages.description: List of languages, accessible to the user. Required if is_admin is set to false.

admin_rights.description: Custom list of user permissions. Possible values are upload, activity, download, settings, create_branches, statistics, keys, screenshots, glossary, contributors, languages, tasks. Omitted or empty parameter will set default admin rights for user role.

get.description: Lists project files and associated key count. If there are some keys in the project that do not have a file association, they will be returned with filename `__unassigned__`. Requires read_files OAuth access scope.

parameters.name: filter_filename
parameters.description: Set filename filter for the list.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Return results starting from this page.

type.description: The type of the process. Can be file-import, sketch-import or bulk-apply-tm.

status.description: Current status of the process. Can be queued, pre_processing, running, post_processing, cancelled, finished or failed.

message.description: Can contain a message related to the current process status (such as an error message).

created_by.description: ID of a user who initiated the process.

created_by_email.description: email of a user who initiated the process.

created_at.description: Date of when the process was created in the queue.

created_at_timestamp.description: Unix timestamp of when the process was created in the queue.

post.description: Queues a localization file for import and returns a 202 or 302 response along with a Queued process object. Learn more. Requires *Upload files* admin right. Supported file types. Please note that the 302 response code is not currently used, but in the future it will be returned if the same file is already in the upload queue. Requires write_files OAuth access scope.

data.description: Base64 encoded file. Must be one of the supported file types.

filename.description: Set the filename. You may optionally use a relative path in the filename (e.g admin/main.json), however keep in mind that path would become a unique part of the file.

lang_iso.description: Language code of the translations in the file you are importing.

convert_placeholders.description: Enable to automatically convert placeholders to the Lokalise universal placeholders.

detect_icu_plurals.description: Enable to automatically detect and parse ICU formatted plurals in your translations.

tags.description: Tag keys with the specified tags. By default tags are applied to created and updated keys.

tag_inserted_keys.description: Add specified tags to inserted keys.

tag_updated_keys.description: Add specified tags to updated keys.

tag_skipped_keys.description: Add specified tags to skipped keys.

replace_modified.description: Enable to replace translations, that have been modified (in the file being uploaded).

slashn_to_linebreak.description: Enable to replace \n with a line break.

keys_to_values.description: Enable to automatically replace values with key names.

distinguish_by_file.description: Enable to allow keys with similar names to coexist, in case they are assigned to different filenames.

apply_tm.description: Enable to automatically apply 100% translation memory matches. This option will take priority over use_automations if set to true.

use_automations.description: Whether to run automations for this upload.

hidden_from_contributors.description: Enable to automatically set newly created keys as "Hidden from contributors".

cleanup_mode.description: Enable to delete all keys with all language translations that are not present in the uploaded file. You may want to make a snapshot of the project before importing new file, just in case.

custom_translation_status_ids.description: Custom translation status IDs to be added to translations. By default statuses are applied to created and updated translations.

custom_translation_status_inserted_keys.description: Add specified custom translation statuses to inserted keys.

custom_translation_status_updated_keys.description: Add specified custom translation statuses to updated keys.

custom_translation_status_skipped_keys.description: Add specified custom translation statuses to skipped keys.

skip_detect_lang_iso.description: Skip automatic language detection by filename.

format.description: File format (e.g. json, strings, xml). Must be file extension of any of the file formats we support.

filter_task_id.description: Apply import results as a part of a task. Available only for offline_xliff file format.

post.description: Exports project files as a .zip bundle. Generated bundle will be uploaded to an Amazon S3 bucket, which will be stored there for 12 months available to download. As the bundle is generated and uploaded you would get a response with the URL to the file. Requires *Download files* admin right. There are two ways to group keys by filenames when you are exporting - either all keys to a single file per language or use the previously assigned filenames. Learn more. Requires read_files OAuth access scope.

format.description: File format (e.g. json, strings, xml). Must be file extension of any of the file formats we support. May also be ios_sdk or android_sdk for respective OTA SDK bundles.

original_filenames.description: Enable to use original filenames/formats. If set to false all keys will be export to a single file per language.

bundle_structure.description: Bundle structure, used when original_filenames set to false. Allowed placeholders are %LANG_ISO%, %LANG_NAME%, %FORMAT% and %PROJECT_NAME%).

directory_prefix.description: Directory prefix in the bundle, used when original_filenames set to true). Allowed placeholder is %LANG_ISO%.

all_platforms.description: Enable to include all platform keys. If disabled, only the keys, associated with the platform of the format will be exported.

filter_langs.description: List of languages to export. Omit this parameter for all languages.

filter_data.description: Narrow export data range. Allowed values are translated or untranslated, reviewed (or reviewed_only), last_reviewed_only, verified and nonhidden.

filter_filenames.description: Only keys attributed to selected files will be included. Leave empty for all.

add_newline_eof.description: Enable to add new line at end of file (if supported by format).

custom_translation_status_ids.description: Only translations attributed to selected custom statuses will be included. Leave empty for all.

include_tags.description: Narrow export range to tags specified.

exclude_tags.description: Specify to exclude keys with these tags.

export_sort.description: Export key sort mode. Allowed value are first_added, last_added, last_updated, a_z, z_a.

export_empty_as.description: Select how you would like empty translations to be exported. Allowed values are empty to keep empty, base to replace with the base language value, null to replace with null (YAML export only), or skip to omit.

export_null_as.description: (Ruby on Rails YAML export only) Select how you would like null (void) translations to be exported. Allowed values are null to keep null, empty to replace with empty string.

include_comments.description: Enable to include key comments and description in exported file (if supported by the format).

include_description.description: Enable to include key description in exported file (if supported by the format).

include_pids.description: Other projects ID's, which keys should be included with this export.

triggers.description: Trigger integration exports (must be enabled in project settings). Allowed values are amazons3, gcs, github, github-enterprise, gitlab, bitbucket, bitbucket-enterprise, azure.

filter_repositories.description: Pull requests will be created only for listed repositories (organization/repository format). Leave empty array to process all configured integrations by platform only.

replace_breaks.description: Enable to replace line breaks in exported translations with \n.

disable_references.description: Enable to skip automatic replace of key reference placeholders (e.g. [%key:hello_world%]) with their corresponding translations.

plural_format.description: Override the default plural format for the file type. Allowed values are json_string, icu, array, generic, symfony, i18next, i18next_v4. See Plurals and placeholders for more information about plural support for specific file formats.

placeholder_format.description: Override the default placeholder format for the file type. Allowed values are printf, ios, icu, net, symfony). See Plurals and placeholders for more information.

webhook_url.description: Once the export is complete, sends a HTTP POST with the generated bundle URL to the specified URL.

original_language_iso.description: Original language code as defined in language settings.

custom_language_iso.description: Language code to replace the original one with.

language_mapping.description: List of languages to override default iso codes for this export.

icu_numeric.description: If enabled, plural forms zero, one and two will be replaced with =0, =1 and =2 respectively. Only works for ICU plural format.

escape_percent.description: Only works for printf placeholder format. When enabled, all universal percent placeholders "[%]" will be always exported as "%%".

indentation.description: Provide to override default indentation in supported files. Allowed values are default, 1sp, 2sp, 3sp, 4sp, 5sp, 6sp, 7sp, 8sp and tab.

yaml_include_root.description: (YAML export only). Enable to include language ISO code as root key.

json_unescaped_slashes.description: (JSON export only). Enable to leave forward slashes unescaped.

java_properties_encoding.description: (Java Properties export only). Encoding for .properties files. Allowed values are utf-8 and latin-1.

java_properties_separator.description: (Java Properties export only). Separator for keys/values in .properties files. Allowed values are = and :.

bundle_description.description: Description of the created bundle. Applies to ios_sdk or android_sdk OTA SDK bundles.

filter_task_id.description: Only keys attributed to the task will be included. Available only for offline_xliff file format.

delete.description: Deletes a file and it's associated keys from the project. This endpoint is only supported for Documents projects. Requires write_files OAuth access scope.

char_limit.description: Maximum allowed number of characters in translations for this key.

get.description: Lists all keys in the project. IMPORTANT: We do not provide a content delivery network for your language files. Do not engage a request to this endpoint with every your website/app visitor. Instead, fetch this endpoint from time to time, store the result locally and serve your visitors with static files/your database content. Alternatively, you may use our Amazon S3/Google CouldStorage integrations in automatically upload your language files to a bucket of your choice. Requires read_keys OAuth access scope.

parameters.name: filter_untranslated
parameters.description: Filter by untranslated keys. Possible values are 1 and 0.

parameters.name: filter_qa_issues
parameters.description: One or more QA issues to filter by (comma separated). Possible values are spelling\_and\_grammar, placeholders, html, url\_count, url, email\_count, email, brackets, numbers, leading\_whitespace, trailing\_whitespace, double\_space, special\_placeholder and unbalanced\_brackets.

parameters.name: filter_archived
parameters.description: One archived filter. Possible values are include, exclude and only.

special_placeholder.description: Count of invalid use of [VOID], [TRUE], [FALSE] placeholders (target).

qa_issues.description: An object containing count for each QA issue type.

language_id.description: A unique language identifier in the system.

words_to_do.description: Count of words remaining to translate from projects base language.

languages.description: An array of project languages with progress percent.

statistics.description: An object containing project statistics, QA issues and project languages progress.

type.description: The type of the process. Can be file-import, sketch-import or bulk-apply-tm.

status.description: Current status of the process. Can be queued, pre_processing, running, post_processing, cancelled, finished or failed.

message.description: Can contain a message related to the current process status (such as an error message).

created_by.description: ID of a user who initiated the process.

created_by_email.description: email of a user who initiated the process.

created_at.description: Date of when the process was created in the queue.

created_at_timestamp.description: Unix timestamp of when the process was created in the queue.

screenshot_id.description: A unique identifier of the screenshot.

key_ids.description: List of key identifiers, the screenshot is attached to.

key_id.description: A unique identifier of the key.

coordinates.description: Key coordinates of the key area

keys.description: List of key keys with coordinates.

width.description: Width of the screenshot, in pixels.

height.description: Height of the screenshot, in pixels.

created_at.description: Creation date of the screenshot.

created_at_timestamp.description: Unix timestamp when the screenshot was created.

modified_at.description: Date and time of last translation modification.

modified_at_timestamp.description: Unix timestamp of last translation modification.

modified_by.description: Identifier of the user, who made last modification.

modified_by_email.description: E-mail of the user, who made last modification.

value.description: The actual segment content. Pass as an object, in case it includes plural forms and is_plural is true.

is_fuzzy.description: Whether the Fuzzy flag is enabled. (Note: Fuzzy is called Unverified in the editor now).

is_reviewed.description: Whether the Reviewed flag is enabled.

reviewed_by.description: Identifier of the user, who has reviewed the translation (if reviewed).

words.description: Number of words in the translation.

custom_translation_statuses.description: Array consisting of Custom Translation Status objects.

snapshot_id.description: A unique identifier of the snapshot.

created_at.description: Date and time of the snapshot creation.

created_at_timestamp.description: Unix timestamp when the snapshot was created.

created_by.description: Identifier of a user, who has created the snapshot.

created_by_email.description: E-mail of a user, who has created the snapshot.

status.description: Status of the task. Allowed values are completed, in_progress, created, queued.

due_date_timestamp.description: Unix timestamp of the Due date.

keys_count.description: Total number of keys in the task.

words_count.description: Total number of source words in the task.

created_at.description: Date and time of the task creation.

created_at_timestamp.description: Unix timestamp when the task was created.

created_by.description: Identifier of a user, who has created the task.

created_by_email.description: E-mail of a user, who has created the task.

can_be_parent.description: Can task be assigned as a parent task.

closing_tags.description: Tags that will be added to affected keys when task is closed.

do_lock_translations.description: If set to true, will lock translations for non-assigned project members.

users.description: List of users, assigned to work on the language.

id.description: A unique identifier of the user group.

groups.description: List of groups, assigned to work on the language.

keys.description: List of keys identifiers, included in task for this language.

status.description: Status of the language in the task. Allowed values are completed, in progress, created.

0%+.description: Number of words with TM match from 0% to 60%.

60%+.description: Number of words with TM match from 60% to 75%.

75%+.description: Number of words with TM match from 75% to 95%.

95%+.description: Number of words with TM match from 95% to 100%.

100%.description: Number of words with TM 100% match.

keys_count.description: Number of keys for the language.

words_count.description: Number of source words for the language.

completed_at.description: Date and time of the language completion.

completed_at_timestamp.description: Unix timestamp when the language was completed.

completed_by.description: Identifier of a user, who has completed the language.

completed_by_email.description: E-mail of a user, who has completed the language.

languages.description: List of languages in the task.

source_language_iso.description: Source language code of the task.

auto_close_languages.description: Whether languages should be closed automatically upon completion of the last item.

auto_close_task.description: Whether the task should be automatically closed upon all language completion.

auto_close_items.description: Whether the translation task items should be automatically marked as completed on edit.

completed_at.description: Date and time of the task completion.

completed_at_timestamp.description: Unix timestamp when the task was completed.

completed_by.description: Identifier of a user, who has completed the task.

completed_by_email.description: E-mail of a user, who has completed the task.

custom_translation_status_ids.description: IDs of custom translation statuses that will be applied to task items after item is completed.

group_id.description: A unique identifier of the group.

is_admin.description: Whether the user has Admin access to the project.

is_reviewer.description: Whether the user has Reviewer access to the project.

is_writable.description: Whether the user has write access to the language.

languages.description: List of languages, accessible to the user.

created_at.description: Date/time at which the group was created.

created_at_timestamp.description: Unix timestamp when the group was created.

projects.description: List of projects, group is added to.

billing_email.description: Email for invoices and translation orders

country_code.description: Country code as described in ISO 3166 (alpha-2 code)

zip.description: Valid postal code for specified country

user_id.description: A unique identifier of the user.

created_at_timestamp.description: Unix timestamp when the user was created.

role.description: Role of the user. Available roles are owner, admin, member, biller.

created_at.description: Date and time when team was created.

created_at_timestamp.description: Unix timestamp when the team was created.

plan.description: Current subscription plan of the team.

users.description: Total number of users allowed in the team.

keys.description: Total number of keys across all team projects.

projects.description: Total number of projects in the team.

mau.description: Total number of monthly active users (for Lokalise SDK).

provider_id.description: A unique identifier of the provider.

price_pair_min.description: Minimum total price per language pair. It's "0.00" if there is no minimum requirement.

pairs.description: List of language pairs and prices.

key_id.description: Identifier of the key of the translation.

modified_at.description: Date and time of last translation modification.

modified_by.description: Identifier of the user, who made last modification.

translation.description: The actual translation content. Pass as an object, in case it includes plural forms and is_plural is true.

is_reviewed.description: Whether the Reviewed flag is enabled.

reviewed_by.description: Identifier of the user, who has reviewed the translation (if reviewed).

words.description: Number of words in the translation.

custom_translation_statuses.description: Array consisting of Custom Translation Status objects.

task_id.description: Identifier of the task, if the key is a part of one, or null if it's not.

segment_number.description: If segmentation is used then this is a segment number. If not then it defaults to 1.

webhook_id.description: A unique identifier of the webhook.

branch.description: If webhook is limited to single branch.
